articles.author: Melanie Walker
articles.title: Nigel Lythgoe breaks silence on Paula Abduls SA allegations - Geo News
articles.description: Paula Abdul filed a lawsuit against her 'American Idol' co-worker at the Los Angeles County Superior Court
articles.content:
Nigel Lythgoe dismissed the sexual assault allegations made by Paula Abdul.
Earlier this week, the American Idol judge accused the 71 year-old producer in a lawsuit filed at the Los Angeles County S… [+977 chars]
